GeneDef.label: minor archite cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bloodstream dedicated to increasing the stability of their cell-replication machinery.\n\nThese options are here to allow the creation of a long living pawn that isn't ageless.

GeneDef.label: archite cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bloodstream dedicated to increasing the stability of their cell-replication machinery.\n\nThese options are here to allow the creation of a long living pawn that isn't ageless.

GeneDef.label: major archite cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bloodstream dedicated to increasing the stability of their cell-replication machinery.\n\nThese options are here to allow the creation of a long living pawn that isn't ageless.

GeneDef.label: minor archite heat tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites throughout their body that help protect them from hot temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against fire, just ambient heat.

GeneDef.label: archite heat tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites throughout their body that help protect them from hot temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against fire, just ambient heat.

GeneDef.label: major archite heat tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites throughout their body that help protect them from hot temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against fire, just ambient heat.

GeneDef.label: minor archite cold tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites throughout their body that help insulate them from cold temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against cold related damage, just low temperatures.

GeneDef.label: archite cold tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites throughout their body that help insulate them from cold temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against cold related damage, just low temperatures.

GeneDef.label: major archite cold tolerance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites throughout their body that help insulate them from cold temperatures.\n\nThis will not protect against cold related damage, just low temperatures.

GeneDef.label: archite fertility
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their cells that make it exceptionally easy for them to become pregnant or impregnate others. Their reproductive system is so hyperactive that just being in the same room is cause for concern.

GeneDef.label: minor archite beauty
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have some archites in their skin dedicated to making their features distinctive and strong without being exaggerated, and their skin is nearly perfect. They are almost always seen as beautiful.

GeneDef.label: archite beauty
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their skin dedicated to making their features distinctive and strong without being exaggerated, and their skin is nearly perfect. They are almost always seen as beautiful.

GeneDef.label: major archite beauty
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a lot of archites in their skin dedicated to making their features distinctive and strong without being exaggerated, and their skin is nearly perfect. They are almost always seen as beautiful.

GeneDef.label: minor archite speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their muscles dedicated to making them move much more quickly than normal.

GeneDef.label: archite speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their muscles dedicated to making them move much more quickly than normal.

GeneDef.label: major archite speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a latge number of archites in their muscles dedicated to making them move much more quickly than normal.

GeneDef.label: minor archite melee damage
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their muscle fibers that make their strikes more accurate and powerful.

GeneDef.label: archite melee damage
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their muscle fibers that make their strikes more accurate and powerful.

GeneDef.label: major archite melee damage
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their muscle fibers that make their strikes more accurate and powerful.

GeneDef.label: minor archite induced happiness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to stopping negative thoughts.

GeneDef.label: archite induced happiness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to stopping negative thoughts.

GeneDef.label: major archite induced happiness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to stopping negative thoughts.

li.label: genetic joy
li.description: Natural bonus from 'minor archite induced happiness' gene.

li.label: genetic joy
li.description: Natural bonus from 'archite induced happiness' gene.

li.label: genetic joy
li.description: Natural bonus from 'major archite induced happiness' gene.

GeneDef.label: minor archite hemogen recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers have a small number of archites in their blood that generate 10 hemogen per day.\n\nUnlike normal hemogen recovery genes, you can only have one type of archite hemogen recovery at a time. These will work with the normal hemogen regen/drain genes.

GeneDef.label: archite hemogen recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers have archites in their blood that generate 20 hemogen per day.\n\nUnlike normal hemogen recovery genes, you can only have one type of archite hemogen recovery at a time. These will work with the normal hemogen regen/drain genes.

GeneDef.label: major archite hemogen recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers have a large number of archites in their blood that generate 30 hemogen per day.\n\nUnlike normal hemogen recovery genes, you can only have one type of archite hemogen recovery at a time. These will work with the normal hemogen regen/drain genes.

GeneDef.label: archite relentlessness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain that stop them from feeling pain and stop them from being slowed down when being hit by damage.

GeneDef.label: minor archite psy-sensitivity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small clump of archites in their body that help them be more influenced by psychic effects.

GeneDef.label: archite psy-sensitivity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a clump of archites in their body that help them be more influenced by psychic effects.

GeneDef.label: major archite psy-sensitivity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large clump of archites in their body that help them be more influenced by psychic effects.

GeneDef.label: archite wakefulness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain that ensure they get tired less quickly than others.

GeneDef.label: archite circadian ryhthm
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain which allows clusters of neurons to sleep while the rest of the brain stays awake. They never need to sleep.

GeneDef.label: minor archite robustness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites throughout their skin and bones dedicated to reducing the amount of damage they receive.

GeneDef.label: archite robustness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites throughout their skin and bones dedicated to reducing the amount of damage they receive.

GeneDef.label: major archite robustness
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites throughout their skin and bones dedicated to reducing the amount of damage they receive.

GeneDef.label: minor archite learning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain that their memories and ability to grasp new ideas quickly.

GeneDef.label: archite learning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain that their memories and ability to grasp new ideas quickly.

GeneDef.label: major archite learning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain that their memories and ability to grasp new ideas quickly.

GeneDef.label: archite tox immunity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their blood that make them totally immune to toxic buildup from all sources including polluted terrain, toxic fallout, tox gas, and direct attacks with venom or injected poison. They are also not bothered by acidic smog.\n\nThe carrier's biochemical pathways are modified to route around interference from nearly all known toxins. Along with enhancements to the kidneys and liver, this keeps carriers comfortable in even the most toxic of environments.

GeneDef.label: minor archite wound healing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their blood dedicated to healing their wounds faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: archite wound healing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their blood dedicated to healing their wounds faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: major archite wound healing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their blood dedicated to healing their wounds faster than normal.
